lead_paragraph: The Vikings are riding a five-game winning streak, during which they have won in ways great and small. They beat Oakland with trick plays and the running of Chester Taylor. They pounced on turnovers to rout the Giants and the 49ers. They dominated the Lions. They rallied in the fourth quarter against the Bears. They have won with Adrian Peterson out for two games and running for 100 yards in only one of the other three.
